channel.title: Of course it happens! Client doesn't let me log in and
channel.description:
[b]And THIS Happens:[/b]
[IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/mrxwkk.jpg[/img]
[b]I dare ask, wtf? All I RECENTLY did, was change a command, add some items in item.cfg and item4.java so they're coded in right, and maybe changed a description of an item in Class8.java.
Accursed errors, always in the way of my work.
Note: 317 server; Czar base; Don't flame for left; Only happens when I try to log into server.[/b][br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 13, 2009, 08:23:07 pm[/size][hr]Absolutely nevermind. This was the most dumb-ass error I've ever seen. And it was fixed.
It was over the CENSOR... Appearently you can't have * as a "badword", so it gives you that shit'd-up error.
--Fixed, feel free to lock.
I Lol'd when I fixed it XP

item.title: Of course it happens! Client doesn't let me log in and
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

And THIS Happens:

[b]I dare ask, wtf? All I RECENTLY did, was change a command, add some items in item.cfg and item4.java so they’re coded in right, and maybe changed a description of an item in Class8.java.

Accursed errors, always in the way of my work.

Note: 317 server; Czar base; Don’t flame for left; Only happens when I try to log into server.[/b][br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 13, 2009, 08:23:07 pm[/size][hr]Absolutely nevermind. This was the most dumb-ass error I’ve ever seen.
And it was fixed.

It was over the CENSOR… Appearently you can’t have * as a “badword”, so it gives you that shit’d-up error.

–Fixed, feel free to lock.

I Lol’d when I fixed it XP
